includes.name: neotokyo
includes.about: sourcemod-nt-include - The de facto NT standard include.

plugins.name: nt_anti_ghostcap_deny
plugins.about: If the last living player of a team suicides (or gets posthumously teamkilled) to prevent a ghost cap, treat it as if the ghost cap happened.

plugins.name: nt_srs_limiter
plugins.about: SRS rof limiter timed from time of shot, inspired by Rain's nt_quickswitchlimiter.

plugins.name: nt_spec_quicktarget
plugins.about: Binds for quickly spectating where the action is.

plugins.name: nt_anti_ghosthop
plugins.about: Forces you to drop the ghost if going too fast mid-air.
